title: Loading screen is "loading" but won't actually load
body:
So, i try to open league, everything seems fine, i press play, it says that the login screen is loading but after two hours it is still loading. I've uninstalled and re-installed league twice and nothing's changed other than me having to update it each time i re-install it.
Please help.

replies.body:
It sounds like there may be a few different things at play that may be preventing you from logging in. I strongly recommend working through our [**Login Issues Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944-Login-Issues) to address the most common solutions for this issue before we move forward.

Please let me know if this resolved your issue or not.
I've tried that before and it didn't work

In that case, we'll have to take a look at your network and system logs to further investigate. I'd recommend running some of those logs using our [**HRT App**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), then be sure to attach those logs to a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) submission so one of our techs can get back to you about this.

Hit me up if you have any issues with this.
